newsitem.title: USA: Warrantech offers warranty to Texaco users.
newsitem.headline: Warrantech offers warranty to Texaco users.

text.p: Warrantech Corp said Wednesday its Warrantech Europe Plc subsidiary was offering warranties on automobile breakdowns related to fuel systems to car owners who use Texaco's CleanSystem gasoline.
The offer is part of Warrantech's European marketing strategy with Texaco Inc and Cornhill Insurance.

Drivers who buy 100 liters of Texaco CleanSystem Gasoline over a six-week period will receive a free one-year warranty when they submit proof of their purchases. Texaco will purchase the warranties from Warrantech as consumers enroll.
For the warranties to remain valid, customers must purchase a minimum of 40 liters of the Texaco gasoline every month. The warranties are available on most makes of cars less than 10 years old.
Warrantech Corp, through its subsidiaries, administers and markets service contracts and after-market warranties on automobiles and other vehicles.
